nodes.text: Star Wars: Bounty Hunters is an ongoing Star Wars comic book series written by Ethan Sacks, illustrated by Paolo Villanelli, and published by Marvel Comics beginning on March 11, 2020. The series features the bounty hunters Beilert Valance, Boba Fett and Bossk, and takes place between the events of Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back and Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. The series' third issue was originally supposed to release on April 8, 2020, but, on April 1, 2020, Marvel Comics was forced to stall their publishing line due to the COVID-19 pandemic. Eventually, Marvel Comics resumed its publishing line and included the third issue in its initial lineup for June 24, 2020.
